response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional piece that offers unparalleled value and functionality. Given its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $14,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its market value and my goal to maximize the return on this unique item. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.", "product_price": 14000}
